A

apply(int, int, int) - Method in class ie.gmit.sw.ImageConverter
apply() receives a int pixel the pixel value and int x x position of pixel and int y y position of pixel The filter the user chose previously will be applied by looping through the filter the pixel is split into three rgb values and multiplied by the kernel after the loop it sets all negative rgb values to positive and makes sure if the value is below 0 or above 255 it sets it back.

F

R

run() - Method in class ie.gmit.sw.ImageConverter
Run() loop through each image in the directory and then loops through each pixel of the image which is filtered and put back into the same x,y position and than the image is read back to the file
run() - Method in class ie.gmit.sw.ImageDirectoryReader
